pages.text: $(item)Powercells$() store massive amounts of power. They can be placed either individually, or they can be placed next to one another to form a multiblock structure. Powercells will automatically distribute RF between themselves and their neighbors, and will join up into a multiblock regardless of tier.

Powercells have no UI, but can be configured to input, output, or ignore power by hitting the desired side with a $(l:rftoolsbase:tools/smartwrench)smart wrench$() in $(thing)Wrench Mode$(). Blue is input, Yellow is output, and a blank side is neither.
By default, the $(item)Powercell (low)$() can hold 500,000RF each.
By default, the $(item)Powercell (Medium)$() can hold 4,000,000RF each.
By default, the $(item)Powercell (high)$() can hold 20,000,000RF each. That's a lot of RF!
